alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 12:34AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Edwards and east central Val Verde Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1234 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Juno, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loma Alta, Carta Valley, Bakers Crossing, Vinegarone and Devils River State Nat Area Del Norte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central Texas.
